mapper.select: SELECT alert_no AS alertNo, m_no AS memberNo, type_code AS typeCode, alert_detail AS alertDetail, alert_uptime AS alertUpTime, alert_readtime AS alertReadTime, status_code AS statusCode FROM alert WHERE m_no = #{memberNo} AND (status_code = 'S010401' OR status_code = 'S010402');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alert (m_no, type_code, alert_detail, status_code) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{typeCode}, #{alertDetail}, 'S010401');
mapper.update: UPDATE alert SET alert_readtime = NOW(), status_code = 'S010402' WHERE alert_no = #{alertNo}
UPDATE alert SET status_code = 'S010403' WHERE alert_no = #{alertNo}
mapper.select: SELECT allow_sms AS allowSms, allow_email AS allowEmail, allow_marketing AS allowMarketing, allow_member AS allowMember, allow_note AS allowNote, allow_bulletin AS allowBulletin, allow_party AS allowParty FROM alert_allow WHERE m_no = #{memberNo}
